messages.subject: Re: Please help!
messages.msgSnippet: ... Nenoi - ... Imai Shirou Kanehira Higuchi Jirou Kanemitsu Tateno  Rokurou Chikatada Nenoi Koyata Yukichika Or you can just call them Imai Kanehira Higuchi
messages.messageBody:
<oda_retainer@...> wrote:
>
> Hey samurai fans, i need some help! I am researching the Gempei war
> for a work of fiction and I need to know the names of Minamoto (kiso)
> Yoshinaka's four generals, the so called "four demon kings of kiso".
> All I have on the subject are the names Imai, Higuchi, Tate and
Nenoi -
> whether those are sur names or family names I am not so sure. If any
> one has helpful information on this subject - please let me know!
>

Imai Shirou Kanehira
Higuchi Jirou Kanemitsu
Tateno Rokurou Chikatada
Nenoi Koyata Yukichika

Or you can just call them
Imai Kanehira
Higuchi Kanemitsu
Tateno Rokurou
Nenoi Koyata

messages.subject: Please help!
messages.msgSnippet: Hey samurai fans, i need some help! I am researching the Gempei war for a work of fiction and I need to know the names of Minamoto (kiso) Yoshinaka s four
messages.messageBody:
Hey samurai fans, i need some help! I am researching the Gempei war
for a work of fiction and I need to know the names of Minamoto (kiso)
Yoshinaka's four generals, the so called "four demon kings of kiso".
All I have on the subject are the names Imai, Higuchi, Tate and Nenoi -
whether those are sur names or family names I am not so sure. If any
one has helpful information on this subject - please let me know!
